channel.title: Known Issue on REDtalks.live
channel.description: Recent content in Known Issue on REDtalks.live

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists
item.description: Documented at: 10/14/2022 Review by: 12/01/2023 Overview The following is a common error with AWS EKS Module v17.x: Error: configmaps "aws-auth" already exists Example module use: module "eks" { source = "terraform-aws-modules/eks/aws" version = "17.

item.title: KNOWN ISSUE: HCP Consul - No support for gossip key rotation
item.description: Documented at: 10/06/2022 Review by: 31/01/2023 The HCP Consul platform does not permit operators to execute a Gossip Key rotation. The Gossip key is used to encrypt the consul agent gossip communication.
